entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
